reviews: Kids zone is great . My son loves Tessa, she is amazing with kids. Thank you all crew Rubi, Tessa,Ivanna, Ivon and Brenda. Room service was great . Also Atzi our planner was amazing.  Food was good , but the service of this hotel was the best. Thanks for everything to make a great memory for our family.

The sports bar is very fun to be at with the waiters and bar tenders named Karwa, gaby, valentin, and gingerz. They did a very good job, there may not be too many places but the sports bar is the place to be here.

Axcel and Valentine have been such a great hosts for mixology. Would recommend them for any activity! Thank you so much for showing us new drinks to make and for making it very entertaining. Would recommend this activity!

This resort is gorgeous !! We had the most relaxing vacation with our friends lounging by the pool or at the swim up bar. I have to mention an excellent service we received through our stay. Our server Didier was amazing !! He treated all of us like a family. Didier and Yvonne (both working by the pool ) made our stay extra special !

Just returned from a 6 night trip from Paradisus Cancun. I traveled with family & young children (19 in our group) a few things you should be aware of.  First the negatives: -No AC in 90% of the hotel :( I wish we knew that before booking because I would have thought twice before going. Our room had AC & maybe 2 restaurants I remember. My brother's room was hot, the AC was terrible. The buffet had AC only in the first few tables (which were never available) if you ever been to Cancun you know the heat + humidity is very uncomfortable.  -Restaurants were long waits so that was frustrating with young children. They do have outdoor pool service for food & room service so that was a great alternative. -The Reserve/Nikte upgrade was a total waste of money. Our Concierge didn't do

The Paridisus is a nice resort but the interior of the building is in need of more renovations. The rooms are nice and spacious but not equal. We had to change rooms do to the AC not working well and the replacement room did not have the same amenities as our original room. My favorite servers were Atilano and Joni. But especially Atilano. He made my breakfast very comfortable and enjoyable.  Other Servers weren't that helpful.  I also enjoyed my concierge Liz, She did a great job making sure we had everything we needed and gave accommodations when we were inconvenienced.  She was awesome.  There was another young lady who's name I forget she wished nightly at the coffee bar and bakery during our stay.  She remembered my favorite drunk and snack and made sure we had it nightly.

Paradisus Cancun - FULL REVIEW!  Some notes: when reading reviews, consider the number of suggestions a reviewer has posted and ask yourself if you want to trust your precious vacation days to someone with 1 review. Also, be open-minded and fair when looking at 1 or 2-star reviews as there are some people who write negative reviews of a hotel because it rained while they were there or had unrealistic expectations (such as asking for a free penthouse suite upgrade when they booked a garden view room). Lastly, if you are going to take one or two specific reviews into consideration, take a look at the writer’s profiles and see if they have been to that location before or if it was their first time. Someone who’s been to a location numerous times has multiple experiences to compare

Excellent holidays with friends. Thank you to Julian Ortega from reception, he gave us so beautiful room! He was really friendly and attentive in every detail! Also the staff from the pool area was very nice, food and drinks are so delicious.

Guendoline Flores from Premium Moments helped me plan a beautiful surprise for my son engagement. She was so helpful and communicating was very easy since we are in the United States. She absolutely went above and beyond. Very organized from getting the photographer, private dinner at the beach, flowers and a special breakfast the morning after. I greatly appreciate all the hard work in planning this special day for my son and future daughter in law. I highly recommend Guendoline and Paradisus Cancun for the special experience they offer.

Room 3559, - the refrigerator was not working - still doesn't have a coffee maker - the room is very hot children are sweating all night. the thermostat says 69 never went below 75 degrees - we were supposed to at the coffee bar sweets and snacks didn't know until they entered our room - housekeeping only left 3 clean towels in total. - The concierge never approached them the entire time we were here.  My room 3006 - We were never given a promised room. we had to except a room on the first floor. this should not be acceptable for the upgrade we paid for. - refrigerator not working. had to be fixed to separate complaints - there was only one small towel left in my room. - never sent us a chair only one chair on the outside balcony all the time - when i dial 0 i usually have to

We came for check in at 10 am after getting up at 4 and taking a flight and everything, and then when we arrive they unapologetically say that the room is not ready and come back in FOUR HOURS. The guy at the desk gives us completely wrong information about a lot of things and all the restaurants he says are open are closed. After 4 hours we come back and the guy calmly says, no sorry the room still isn’t ready, come back in another 30 minutes. We can’t even do anything, we don’t even have our luggage because they took them, and we’re bored out of our minds. Horrible, horrible service, I would never recommend this hotel.

Paradisus is a great family resort. Views are amazing from all areas of hotel.We went with our 3 teenagers. Everything is so close. Beach, pools are so close to all rooms which made me feel at ease when my boys wanted to roam free. The excursions they recommend are outstanding. I can’t say enough about the entire staff at resort. They do go above and beyond to help with any needs or questions. They all have such positive attitudes. One staff member that absolutely stood out was Gaudencio. He was our server at beach. So anytime you’re on beach make sure to look for him. He took care of us all 6 days and was on top of everything. Making sure my children and husband had everything they needed. He constantly checked in on us and knew all our orders ahead of time. Food at beach was

We had an incredible 10night stay! Amazing service at the bars and restaurants. Loved the all day coffee counter! Highlight was definitely the activities team with the sports and games during the day and entertainment in the evening. Special shout-out to Axcel and Benny from the activities team!

For a week vacation the hotel covered our needs with a clean room, good food and great spa. The kids care was great, we got lots of help from the concierge on tips using the hotels events. Would I stay again, probably not, would I recommend? Maybe if the stay is less than $250 per night.

When booking in this hotel, be aware of the transportation to the hotel. The Uber app works but apparently local taxi hate Uber drivers. This hotel does not have specific transportation transportation costs in our case two adults two kids $71. The beds by the pool are extra. Only a few bars have premium drinks.

Tessa and Rubi were wonderful, they always very attentive to the kids and make it fun for them.  My daughter loves Kidsdome.  Everyday she always ask to go there.  I will bring my family again to Paradisus Cancun

Resort is  clean, we had a big room. However,all inclusive foods is kinda turned us down which limited how mamtime you c eat. Each family or couples has assigned a personal person who can make reservation for  your dinner vs we can visit any where we want to. You have to make reservation a head of time and I do not know what foods I should try the next day? But I have to choose one and make reservation? I do not think that is what I want, since I do not want to depending on everyone else.

We’re at Paradisus for a wedding and was greeted by some of the most amazing staff! The Reserved is highly recommended if you’re looking for a quite place away from crowds. The pool staff is best! Miguel & Moises took great care of us everyday while we’re there, Gabby at the Ginger lounge was also amazing. Alejandro from Malva also took really good care of us! All in all the staff really made this staff stand out! Thank you!

I love nature and the hotel has loads of outdoor space for nature lovers. Awesome beach, clean water with low waves, lots and lots of cozy sitting spaces.   And like 7 beautiful restaurants for varying pallets.   Best part for me is you can eat and drink as much as you want in any restaurant free. Yes, free, because your room rate already covers all that, cocktails and alcohol inclusive.

The rooms need a mayor AC renovation, we had to change rooms twice because they didnt cool down. Other than that, the personel was very nice. My respects and 100 points to CRIS from guest services, who was so nice and helped us twice retrieveing forgotten items in our room changing voyage.

We had fun with gaby, Karina and evaristo at the ginger bar. They are the best people we met at paradisus cancun. Hope to see them again. Absolutely, they're really amazing people. Thanks for this incredible vacation!

This place is amazing! We stayed over the 4th of July weekend, and we will be coming back for a longer stay in February. Mainly because of the delicious food (Lemon Fish is incredible), the comfortable and super clean rooms, the service, thanks in large part to Alejandro, Jorge and Alberto! But above all else, the Kidsdom! My girls (4 &7) begged to go back every day and couldn’t wait for the kids activities! The staff are so great with the kids, especially Tessa, Rubi, Ivana & Bruno. They have had so much fun there, they made t-shirts and bracelets, had a movie night and they are on their way to make wind socks!! This place is awesome :)

My husband and I were celebrating our wedding reception at Paradisus with family and friends. George was our concierge for the week, along with 2 other guests. George hands down provided impeccable service from day 1!! Always a phone call, text or in person visit away. He was on top of it from the night we checked in. Whether we needed something for our room, restaurant reservations or bali beds near the pool George made it happen. He checked in on us every day and always informed us of his schedule in case we needed anything. George made our stay at the Paradisus a VIP experience. We will definitely be back for our 1 year anniversary and will definitely be requesting George to be our concierge again. I would give George 10 stars if I could. Also shout out to my heaven sent

Waited 2 hours past check in time to get a room. Shower curtain smelled and shower head sprayed everywhere. A/C did not work the last 2 days of our stay. They forgot to leave towels and stock our mini bar 1 day. Room service had up 2 hours of wait time. All restaurants had a line and waiting time of over 45 mins. We were not able to eat at the Lemon Fish restaurant because every day they had a waiting time of 2 hours. Staff and waiters were no help and were very rude. I had previously stayed at the resort in 2016 and had a wonderful experience. Came back for that reason. This time I am not planning on ever going back.

My wife and I were celebrating our wedding reception at Paradisus with family and friends. George was appointed to be our concierge for the week, he provided service to our room 5412(wonderful room) and 2 others. George provided impeccable service and was always a phone call or in person visit away. Whether we needed something for our room, restaurant reservations or bali beds near the pool George made it happen. George checked in on us every day and always informed us of his schedule in case we needed anything. George made our stay at the Paradisus a VIP experience. We will definitely be back for our 1 year anniversary and would love for George to be our concierge again. 5 stars is not enough for George I wish I could give more.

I wouldn't say that this hotel was built around kids, but we still enjoyed our time as a family of four here.  The kids enjoyed the beach and pool for hours and we enjoyed being together and laying around being together - the point of the trip.  I hadn't intended to sign my kids up for the kids club, but the calendar for the Kidsdom was enticing enough that the kids wanted to go on their own.  The staff there was great - Tessa, Rubí, Ivana, and Bruno - took good care of the kids with constant programming, not just to sit in a room and play with random toys.  As my oldest says: "It is an appropriate and fun for kids of all ages."  The kids really enjoyed the crafts at the Kidsdom and by Handmade on the Terrace every day at 4.

Me encanto el servicio de Ivón, Itzel, Bruno & Ivanna. Súper atentos y cuidadosos con mis hijos de 3 y 6 años. Me encanto que tienen literalmente actividades cada hora. Las favoritas de mis kiddos fueron las actividades  de piscina y el show de magia. I love the service that’s Kidsdom provide. They were super helpful and attentive to my kids. Is great that they have activities every hour. My kids loved the Pool activities and the magic show. I will definitely comeback just for all the activities that they have. THANKS KIDSDOM!!!

What a wonderful family vacation! Paradisus Cancún did not disappoint especially with Axcel keeping the adults and kids entertained with the pool inflatables, basketball, beach volleyball and magic tricks. Steferino was also the best server with great service and recommendations at lemon fish and aqua marina. Amazing people at a beautiful place!

Best vacation ever! Loved everything about Paradisus. Delicious food and outstanding service throughout our stay. Special shout out for Axcel the activities coordinator. He made the trip special for our entire family. He engaged everyone in basketball, volleyball, and card tricks. Lemon Fish was so good. Loved the food and Daniel and Seferino. Alexandro started our morning off great in the buffet. I highly recommend the Paradisus for your next vacation.

We loved the fun activities that Axcel lead! Specifically basketball, volleyball, obstacle course and watching his magic tricks! Seferino was an awesome waiter at LemonFish and Aqua Marino! Great atmosphere, food and fun! Definitely recommend!

We have a bad experience with people in the lobby at the check in . They made us to wait until 11 pm to decide to switch our room. Ee had no AC in the old room, we reprted several times  but they ignored us.  But at the breakfast and lunch the Pascual team made our stay very pleasnt. Pascual is a very kund  and he pay attention to the customers. Also    Manuel Ledesma, Antonio and Reynaldo. Thank to them our stay was a success. We have been very disappointed with the customer service the hotel has, We will not come back and we will not recommend this until Something change. Thank you Pascual team.

Great service and very friendly. Explained all options and was very welcoming. Daniel was quick and built a strong environment for a great night with the family. His service was remarkable and amazing.

Jesus and Francisco at Agua Marina were amazing!!! Brought out champagne and a sparkler for our anniversary! Francisco also took some great pictures of us. We plan on returning tomorrow to the same restaurant.

We ate at blue agave and the food was good and the service was great. Iran , Osvaldo and chef did a great job to make us feel welcome.they serve only tacos but they have also vegetarian. Drinks are good. Place clean and was organized. Would recommend.

Pros:  Nice, clean rooms Beachfront  The service in the pool area was very good. Shoutout to servers Gabriela & Jamil for being fantastic, and Alex, the activities guy, was a lot of fun too.   Cons: The rooms were quite warm. Our AC unit said it was 18.5C (65F) and there's no way that was the actual temperature. We had to sleep on top of the covers at night.  The lobby area in the main building was also very warm. This is where several restaurants are and we were sweating quite a bit in this area.   A swimup bar in The Reserve pool would have been a nice addition.

Hamlet was incredibllly helpful in helping us mitigate check in and check out very thankful for hamlets help. The food was delicious check. In was incredibly easy! Everything we needed they provided promptly and were the most genuine hospitable people! I loooove them

Amazing. Cannot rave enough about our experience. The gorgeous water views, the incredible atmosphere, the friendly staff, the amazing service, and the delicious food and drinks. We went here on our honeymoon and stayed for 7 days, and we did not cease to be amazed. This was our first experience with an all-inclusive resort, and we felt like we weren't paying enough for how luxurious we felt! Highly recommend. We cannot wait to come back again!

Best restaurant at Melia Paradisus Cancun The best restaurant: Blue Agave, Mexican tacos really authentic, Alfredo the chef, Awesome!!! and Oswaldo our server, very attentive and kind. The ambiance is co... Date of stay: July 2023

We went to Blueagave for dinner on our last night of vacation in Cancun. The tacos were delicious and the margarita was good too! The service was excellent. Osvaldo was pleasant, welcoming, and provided great service. Gracias for a good taco night experiment!

Food was the worst waiting times to be seated almost 45 to 1 hour  food terrible flavors served cold  Room Not working the air conditioning and was not Fixed they send us a Fan Not great in entertainment

Very nice professional and courteous service . Nice ambience and good food quality overall . The check in process was orderly and good. The sushi and the soup along with the drinks is very good . 5 star overall

This was my 6th trip to Paradisus Cancún so it’s obvious that overall I love it. Just walk into the lobby and  it smells like heaven. The resort was super clean and well maintained the entire week by workers. The staff is amazing all around the property. Pools are amazing. We loved the cabanas and pool side attendants on the reserved side. It’s definitely worth upgrading to The Reserve. Building 5 is lovely.   My biggest complaints as it has been for 6 trips are the restaurants and nightly entertainment. The buffet was wonderful for breakfast and lunch. It was ok for dinner but one section is closed because it’s the waiters station for the Italian restaurant. The other restaurants are just bad in my opinion. Sal’s steakhouse is highly overrated. I will admit that entertainment

Great service from our Concierge Diego, always available and professional. I highly recommend NIKTE experience and Diego as a concierge at Paradisus Cancún for great service.   A thank you for Sandy for her kindness and professionalism at the spa. As well as a thank you to the waiters for being attentive and professional as well. Especially Ignacio, Joni, Alejandro, Alberto and Angel.

Rafael was really good . We are vegetarian and he took care of us. He even surprised by some non alcoholic juice. I would go again to Fish Lemon just because of him. Rafael is the man. Thank you so much we had nice after few days.

Rafael was amazing!! We were struggling to find good food on our stay but he changed that for us. His suggestions were outstanding, everything we had was very good! The appetizers he recommended and dessert were great! Would definitely recommend asking for Rafael on your visit.

Lemon fish was great, but I don’t think our time here would be as perfect without Rafel as our waiter. He basically read our minds with recommendations for our entrees. When you are coming here ask for him, and if you are staying in the resort, this is a must go!

What a wonderful experience at the Paradisus Cancun,  we have a fabulous lunch at the Royal Service,   the Sante Restaurant with the FRESHEST  FISH I have ever tried.   The food,  the service the view and obviously the company,  make our visit a memorable one.   I will definitely be back soon!

The property is nice, although it was humid inside. We couldn’t escape the heat until we got into our room. We enjoyed the room, but it did lack something’s…. An iron, some towels, and a bottle opener (which was needed to open the bottled water bottles in the fridge.)  Upgrading to The Reserve was a good choice, even though we didn't get our own pool, there was a good size section  just for the reserve members. The open bar in the lobby for the reserve had good choices, but the snack bar sat out to the point where there were fruit flies and nuts were stale.   I wish there was airport shuttle services included with our stay. But there was only taxis for a minimum of $40 USD to the airport.  Public restrooms were not kept up with cleanliness.  The staff assigned to answer our

It was the most fun filled family vacation. Service was amazing. This is our second time staying at Paradisus and I know we will be back again. Boys loved the stay, food, water, kids activities and gifts. Hamlet was very nice and helped during check out.

I’m going to write this review in full disclosure because I wish someone would’ve fully informed me about this place before I went as I am going to inform you now. Please keep in mind we paid extra for VIP service or what they call “The Reserve” guests.   First and foremost, the staff gets 5 stars. They were absolutely amazing. I will provide you with names with places below.   Checking in: Upon your arrival, you walk into Tower three. I read that you are to be served a drink from when you walk in however, that was not provided. As noted, we paid extra for the reserved package. I was surprised that while regular guest were provided an air-conditioned lounge to check in, we were told to walk pass two towers to find the reserve check in area in the heat. Our room wasn’t ready, we

The pool and beach area were great. Food was okay, but I liked that there was a good variety . Overall a good resort for family. I loved that they had tons of activities every night. However, I did not like that the room was never cool enough. Every single restaurant that we went to was HOT . Everywhere that we walked inside the resort was very hot. I love the beach but when it’s time for dinner , I like to feel refreshed after a nice shower but that was never the case. I stayed there 6 nights. People were very nice.

This review is for our two favorite servers at Malva, Alfredo and Martin. The hospitality these two provide is superb. They go above and beyond with all the guests. We’ve had our family vacation here for many years and coming back is like seeing family when we see them. This resort is so lucky to have them. Thank you Alfredo and Martin for your amazing service and incredible work ethic.   From the Lavyn Family ❤️

The resort was as expected. It was vast but was negotiable with a lot of walking. We had a party of 15 Family members and generally we were happy with most of the amenities. With a party as large as ours, there were a few room glitches (bathroom drainage + A/C problems). As a result, switching rooms sometimes took a bit to do covering a day or so. The MOST important thing was that the staff of the Paradisus Cancun was top notch and was very helpful in all facets of service. Joni Atilano and Viajes Jiménez was especially helpful when it came to the restaurant Malva. They placed our Family basically in the same table area every time we were there no matter how many of us attended breakfast, lunch and dinner. The rest of the staff was great from check in to check out. If we ever

We visited 6/28-7/2. This was our 5th time to Paradisus I believe! We stayed in the Reserve section and Victor S was our concierge. He was very friendly and helpful! We knew our way around and didn't need a lot of extra supervision so we appreciated that he was checking in on the what's ap and helped us set up reservations with Sal and the cenote excursion but he didn't hover over us. Great job Victor tailoring your service to what the customer wanted. Jennifer, the worker running the towel hut/Bali beds at the Reserve pool was absolutely fantastic! She really listened to our requests and tried to accommodate as many people as she could. We ended up with a bed on 4 of our 5 days by getting on the wait-list. The new change to NO Reservations for restaurants: I am torn. We showed

Trying hard to put my emotions aside. This place is grand, no question. The hotel design, lobby areas, and the so called “reserve” sections are all magnificent. The reserve is in particular very well maintained. The pool area is pretty extensive, well setup. Some of the personnel enjoy their jobs, but certainly not all. These are in my mind the only positives of this hotel. The quality of the  all- inclusive food is dubious. While the omelet station and ready made food is OK, the rest is not. While there are restaurants where you can sit and order food, good luck trying to get a table, specially at the on-prem steak house. This place is a joke. Guests who pay for the “reserve” enjoy a portion of “included” items from the menu. Good luck trying to get a table while you are

I had an amazing time at Paradisus Cancun. I stayed there recently for my boyfriends birthday. The staff went above and beyond at every turn. We stayed in the Reserve section which was adults only and it was amazing. The room was very large and clean. The food was ok over all but the Sal steakhouse was very good. Our server Juan was a delight. I would definitely recommend and would love to come back again!

Though we completed the pre-check process, it still took almost an hour to check in.  Many more clerks are needed at the check-in desk.  Some signage would be most helpful, after standing around for quite some time, we found out that the Reserve check in is in  Building 5.  The lack of air conditioning in the common area of the main lobby building (Building 3) made it very uncomfortable.  Some of the entertainment is in the Ginger Bar, I felt bad for the performers and everyone watching, sweat was dripping from everyone.    The room needs some updating, though the bed was very comfortable.  The tile in the bathroom, though pretty, looks as though the construction crew forgot to clean up after the job, splats of grout here there and everywhere, plus they left construction writing

This is our 4th visit to Paradisus Cancun, reserved section. The only reason we choose reserved area is due to the Sante restaurant.  All the staff really pamper us. They work as a team to make us feel so special.  Thank you Moises for always for positive and cheerful.

I am here with my Family and we are staying at the Reserve. We love the pampering from the entire staff. Moises makes us feel like Family. The drinks and food are excellent, but the service makes the difference.  Thank you Moises.

My little sister had her wedding at the Paradisus Cancun & this establishment went above & beyond  making my family feel like home.  Our family chose the Nikte experience & it was worth every penny. From check in, to restaurant selection, to our room being stocked with milk for my 18 month old every day. It was well work my sanity to make sure things we up to our families par.  With our Nikte experience, we had a butler on call. On of the butlers, Lily M., made our stay so special. From setting up reservations for us off the property, to making sure our laundry service was done when my toddler got sick & soiled his clothing. She was so attentive to every detail & even helped us find a “nanny” to watch our son for a few hours whom she trusted and credentialed by the hotel. (Thank
